Class 3
January 21, 2016

Basic HTML

17 tags to start

Activity

## In Cloud 9 * Create a new HTML file called "aboutme.html" * Type in the basic HTML template * Give your page the title "About Me" * Add your name inside the body tags wrapped in h2 tags * Add an image to your aboutme.html page using the img tag (http://tucson.com/app/images/ua/storm.jpg) * Finally, center your name and the image

Assignment

Find 10 errors in the HTML file that will be handed out
